name: Fast Downloader - save photo, video on Instagram
description: New Achievement: Fast Downloader on Instagram has reached 1.000.000 downloads  Fast Downloader app helps you to fast download photo, video on Instagram   You want to fast download photo, video and repost on Instagram. We create Fast Downloader just for you   It will help you easily and quickly download, save, repost any photos or videos from Instagram that you want just in a second.  FEATURES  Totally FREE   Easy setup download from Instagram with 1 CLICK   Fast download speed, just in a second   Multiple download photos & videos at the same time   Clear and nice dashboard to view all save photos & videos   Easy to edit, delete photos & videos   Easy share photo, video with your friends   Guide to use 1. Turn on Fast Download Service on app first 2. Open Instagram and tap menu (3 dots) button on photo/video you like 3. Choose Copy Link or Share. The photo/video will auto download and save in your SD Card  If you love Fast Downloader please take a moment to leave a review or send your feedback to contact.awesomedroid@gmail.com We are glad to receive your feedback and welcome to support you at anytime Thank you for using Fast Downloader!  Note: Please respect the copyrights of Instagram users
